meanings.definition: A person who owns or is an official of a bank.
meanings.sent1: The bankers at the local branch are friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: My dad is a banker and works at the bank downtown.
meanings.sent3: Why did the banker bring a pillow to work? To give the bank a rest!
meanings.sent4: The banker's smile was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: I always feel safe knowing the bankers are looking after my money.

meanings.definition: A financial institution that accepts deposits and channels the money into lending activities.
meanings.sent1: We trust the bankers with our savings because they keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The new bankers in town have introduced innovative loan schemes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the banker go to the beach? To surf the waves of financial success!
meanings.sent4: The banker's vault is a fortress protecting people's hard-earned money.
meanings.sent5: The bankers' decisions can impact the economy of the entire country.
